 Debugger related defines.
#define DEBUG_NUMREGS   512
 Total number of (64 bit)registers stored.

 Increment size for exception base addresses (4k minimum).
#define SE_APP_EXCEPTION_BASE   0x2000
#define SE_APP_EXCEPTION_SIZE   0x4000

 DRAM section reserved for the Linux kernel (we want this to be contiguous with the bootloader reserved area to that they can be merged on free.
#define OCTEON_ENV_MEM_NAME   "__bootloader_env"

#define OCTEON_FDT_BLOCK_NAME   "__fdt"

Total number of (64 bit)registers stored.

#define DEBUG_STACK_SIZE   1024

Debugger related defines.

#define EXCEPTION_BASE_INCR   (4*1024)

Increment size for exception base addresses (4k minimum).

#define IDLE_CORE_BLOCK_NAME   "idle-core-loop"
#define IDLE_CORE_BLOCK_SIZE   0x10
#define OCTEON_BOOTLOADER_LOAD_MEM_NAME   "__tmp_load"

DRAM reserved for loading images.

This is freed just before the application starts, but is used by the bootloader for loading ELF images, etc

#define OCTEON_BOOTLOADER_NAMED_BLOCK_TMP_PREFIX   "__tmp"
#define OCTEON_ENV_MEM_NAME   "__bootloader_env"

Named block name for block containing u-boot environment that is created for use by application.

#define OCTEON_FDT_BASE   (512 * 1024)
#define OCTEON_FDT_BLOCK_NAME   "__fdt"

Named block name for block containing the flat device tree that is created for use by applications and the Linux kernel.

#define OCTEON_FDT_MAX_SIZE   (128 * 1024)
#define OCTEON_IDLE_CORE_MEM   (1*1024*1024 - IDLE_CORE_BLOCK_SIZE)

Reserved DRAM for idle code.

#define OCTEON_LINUX_RESERVED_MEM   (OCTEON_IDLE_CORE_MEM + IDLE_CORE_BLOCK_SIZE)
#define OCTEON_LINUX_RESERVED_MEM_NAME   "__tmp_reserved_linux"

DRAM section reserved for the Linux kernel (we want this to be contiguous with the bootloader reserved area to that they can be merged on free.

#define OCTEON_RESERVED_LOW_BOOT_MEM_SIZE   (1024*1024)

NOTE: U-Boot will always reserve the first 1MB of memory.

#define OCTEON_RESERVED_LOW_MEM_SIZE   (512*1024)

Reserved DRAM for exception vectors, bootinfo structures, bootloader, etc.

#define OCTEON_UBOOT_EXCEPT_HANDLER_ALIGNMENT   (4096)

Alignment for U-Boot exception handler table.

#define OCTEON_UBOOT_EXCEPT_HANDLER_BASE
Value:
((OCTEON_FDT_BASE + OCTEON_FDT_MAX_SIZE +       \
      OCTEON_UBOOT_EXCEPT_HANDLER_ALIGNMENT - 1) &      \
     ~(OCTEON_UBOOT_EXCEPT_HANDLER_ALIGNMENT - 1))

Reserved for U-Boot exception handler.

#define OCTEON_UBOOT_EXCEPT_HANDLER_NAME   "__tmp_uboot_exception"

Named block for U-Boot exception handler.

#define OCTEON_UBOOT_EXCEPT_HANDLER_SIZE   (0x500)

Size of exception handler table.

#define SE_APP_EXCEPTION_BASE   0x2000
#define SE_APP_EXCEPTION_SIZE   0x4000
